programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: TV Patrol Express Live
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: BRGY S4
programme.desc: BRGY features interesting and humorous stories about Filipinos and businesses in North America.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.title: Love In 40 Days
programme.desc: Jane gets into a car accident and ends up in Evergreen Mansion, a transitory place in the afterlife. She has to stay there for 40 days while waiting for a potential crossover to heaven. But Evergreen Mansion is in danger of being demolished because of businessman Edward's plans.

programme.title: Rated Korina
programme.desc: Join host Korina Sanchez as she seeks out people from all walks of life, weaving together their individual stories to paint a larger picture of the society we live in.

programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.desc: A daily celebration of the Liturgy of the Lord.

programme.title: Chef RV's Kitchen S19
programme.desc: Chef RV's Kitchen brings you a collection of cooking and baking video tutorials by chef restaurateur and award-winning cookbook author, RV Manabat.

programme.title: Wow
programme.desc: TFC continues to bring you the best of Filipino TV, movie and event entertainment, as well as timely news information that directly impacts your community!

programme.title: Tulong Ko Pasa Mo

programme.title: Tao Po
programme.desc: This programme features short narratives spanning a wide range of compelling topics from hot issues, inspiring human interest pieces, popular trends, profiles and entertainment.

programme.title: Ano Na, Bev S5

programme.title: Darna
programme.desc: Narda, an emergency medical technician and a loving breadwinner to the Custodio family, is destined to become the next protector of the powerful stone that enables her to transform into a superhero who has special abilities to help those in danger.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.title: Fast Talk With Boy Abunda
programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.title: 24 Oras
programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Pbb Teens
programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Sanggang

programme.title: Reporter's Notebook
programme.desc: Features stories culled from the reporters' own files, news that people did not see on the news programs. The show is written and hosted by the network's aggressive young reporters and hosted by the network.

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Maka
programme.desc: It is a youth-oriented drama series that follows the lives of six high school students enrolled in the Arts & Performance section of public school, Douglas Mac Arthur High School for the Arts aka. MAKA.

programme.title: Wish Ko Lang
programme.desc: The first wish-granting program on Philippine television, featuring inspiring stories of ordinary Filipinos as they struggle to overcome extraordinary situations.

programme.title: Tadhana
programme.desc: An Overseas Filipino Workers themed weekly anthology that will dramatize the colorful, romantic, heroic, and inspiring stories of OFWs.

programme.title: Regal Studio Presents
programme.desc: A collection of weekly specials which feature timely, feel-good stories.

programme.title: Resibo: Walang Lusot Ang May Atraso
programme.desc: A public service program aimed at giving a voice to the public's grievances and complaints, exposing wrongdoing, and providing concrete resolutions.

programme.title: Pbb Teens
programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.title: 24 Oras Weekend
programme.desc: A weekend report on the latest happenings in the Philippines and around the world.

programme.title: Maka
programme.desc: It is a youth-oriented drama series that follows the lives of six high school students enrolled in the Arts & Performance section of public school, Douglas Mac Arthur High School for the Arts aka. MAKA.

programme.title: Pepito Manaloto, Tuloy Ang Kuwento
programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: Bblgang
programme.desc: A refreshing, exciting and funny show with an assortment of gags, spoofs, and comic performances.

programme.title: The Boobay And Tekla Show
programme.desc: A comedy program that features a wide range of hilarious discussion topics in pop culture, entertainment, current events, society, sports, cyber culture and more.

programme.title: Resibo: Walang Lusot Ang May Atraso
programme.desc: A public service program aimed at giving a voice to the public's grievances and complaints, exposing wrongdoing, and providing concrete resolutions.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: A documentary on the different issues in society hosted by a set of trusted broadcast journalists in the country

programme.title: Maka

programme.desc: A refreshing, exciting and funny show with an assortment of gags, spoofs, and comic performances.

programme.title: The Boobay And Tekla Show
programme.desc: A comedy program that features a wide range of hilarious discussion topics in pop culture, entertainment, current events, society, sports, cyber culture and more.

programme.title: Global Pinoy Unlimited
programme.desc: Global Pinoy Unlimited features community news, Pinoy headliners and their significant contributions to the community, as well as special kababayan and Kapuso happenings across the globe.

programme.title: Wish Ko Lang
programme.desc: The first wish-granting program on Philippine television, featuring inspiring stories of ordinary Filipinos as they struggle to overcome extraordinary situations.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre Marathon
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Magpakailanman
programme.desc: A drama anthology featuring real-life inspired stories.

programme.title: Pepito Manaloto, Tuloy Ang Kuwento
programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: GMA Pinoy Blockbuster: 'Working Boys 2 Choose Your Papa'
programme.desc: Inspired by the 1986 Working Boys of the TVJ (Tito, Vic & Joey), about the bums who need to strategize in life. peace.

programme.title: GMA Pinoy Blockbuster: 'X And Y'
programme.desc: Ysha wants to travel to make amends with people she hurt in the past. Xander needs money to support his family. The two accidentally meet- - will love to find its way through them too?

programme.title: Matinik Na Bading, Mga Syokeng Buking
programme.desc: Apolinario and his uncle Boyong came from a family of barbers. They earned very little and in order to make more, they pretended to be gay.

programme.title: Wala Nang Iibigan Pang Iba
programme.desc: Sharon Cuneta and Cesar Montano teamed up in a wacky adventure that took them around rarely seen picturesque spots in the island of Luzon. Their escape led to a long, arduous and very funny chase, where they fought the bad guys and fell deeply in love.

programme.title: Proboys
programme.desc: This is the story of five young women, their adventures and misadventures in their search for Mr. Right.

programme.title: Rocky N Rolly (Suntok Sabay Takbo)
programme.desc: The swindling trio of Rolly, Alex and Cleto earn big bucks by using different disguises to fool people. They soon join forces with ex-boxer, Rocky, who quit the sport after syndicate hench men beat him up for refusing him to join the game.

programme.title: Bakit May Kahapon Pa?
programme.desc: Award-winning actress Nora Aunor turned in one of her finest performances as Helen, a survivor.

programme.title: Bukas Uulan Ng Bala
programme.desc: Elias (Dante Varona) goes home to his province for the town fiesta, expecting a festive reunion with his family. A tragedy awaits instead.

programme.title: Ikaw
programme.desc: The song, Ikaw, is the backdrop of this touching melodrama about a young composer and the love of his life. Sharon played a doctor who always decided using her head while Ariel was a composer who put his heart into everything he did.

programme.title: Paano Ang Kahapon... Kung Wala Na Ang Ngayon
programme.desc: Two hearts so much apart of one found love \"Verbotten\" in a world not of their own creation. For they met too early for destiny, too late for happiness.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Lupang Hinirang
programme.desc: Berting (Jestoni Alarcon) is a forklift operator in Don Franco's (Bernard Bonnin) quarry. Elena (Rina Reyes) is the Don's unica hija, heir to all of his fortune. Berting and Elena fall in love in the most unusual of circumstances.

programme.title: Anak Ni Boy Negro
programme.desc: Nap never knew his father, and wanting to please his mother, he never bothered to find out anything about the notorious small time hood. But in his heart, he knew he deserved more than the shanty he grew up in.

programme.title: Muling Umawit Ang Puso
programme.desc: A popular singer-actress went into seclusion after the traumatic experience of watching her pregnant sister die in the wake of a stampede of her fans. Nearly twenty years later, she took in a young girl who wanted to be a star and tried to mold her into a copy of what she was before.

programme.title: Magic Kingdom: Ang Alamat Ng Damortis (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The daughter of the Empress Sophia,became the target of her uncle Basilicus’ murderous wrath after he killed the empress and crowned himself emperor.

programme.title: Row 4, The Balilktorians
programme.desc: The daughter of the Empress Sophia,became the target of her uncle Basilicus’ murderous wrath after he killed the empress and crowned himself emperor.

programme.title: Bad Boys Gang
programme.desc: Daang Buenaventura, head of the bad boys gang (and an avid follower of Robin Padilla, hence the similar ways and manner of his everyday lifestyle) prefers living in jail rather than enjoying the free life at the young age of 17.

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Mangarap? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lisa (Vilma Santos) and Benny (Jay Ilagan) have found their match in each other. Unfortunately, Benny dies before they get married.

programme.title: Utang Ko Sa Iyo Ang Buhay Ko
programme.desc: Action superstar Ace Vergel returns to the screen as the courageous policeman with a mission. Action-packed from beginning to end.

programme.title: Nena
programme.desc: Article 201 of the Revised Penal Code of the Philippines is the law on offenses against decency. This is the law that Nena, a stripper, has violated. Poor and uneducated, Nena sees her work as the only way in order for her family to survive.

programme.title: Kuwatog
programme.desc: Child sensation Niño Muhlach plays the lovable dwarf \"Kuwatog.\" As punishment for his many pranks, he is transformed into a human child, here to remain until he does a deed that will benefit mankind.

programme.title: Nag-iisang Ikaw
programme.desc: Cissy (Mikee Cojuangco) started to doubt if Albert (Matthew Mendoza) was the right man for her. While working for a fashion magazine, she met a photographer, Aaron (Keempee De Leon).

programme.title: Saan Darating Ang Umaga (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: With Shane now already grown up and in college, her parents decided to adopt a little boy to complete their family. But after the excitement of his arrival has worn off, Shane began to have feelings of jealousy towards the boy her parents were now so enchanted with.

programme.title: Pangarap Na Ginto
programme.desc: High School friends Sheila (Dina), Daisy (Dawn) and Sandy (Timmy) renew their ties after a school reunion. Turns out all three has given false claims. Soon, each one learns to deal with their own personal problem with the help of each other's company.

programme.title: Macario Durano
programme.desc: When a corrupt police captain and his henchmen framed up Durano for a crime he did not commit. He then escaped from prison with revenge foremost in his mind.

programme.title: Noel Juico, 16 Batang Kriminal
programme.desc: Noel (Raymart Santiago) tries to stay out of trouble. But trouble seems to follow him anyway. Can Noel disentangle himself from the dangerous web he himself created?
